thread.section_title: Hudson Reed USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hudson Reed USA | usa.hudsonreed.com
thread.title: James R G.
thread.title_full: Hudson Reed USA reviewed by James R G.

author: James R G.
title: James R G.
text: I am totally impressed with the efficiency of the sales representatives, the prompt shipping/delivery of the product, and the quality of the wall radiator unit I purchased. Great pricing....the plumber who installed it for me couldn't get over the quality of the unit for the money. It is in and working great. Thank you Hudson Reed USA!
